original_text: Then they arrived at Marah. But they could not drink the water there because it was too bitter. That is why they called that place ‘Marah’. 15: ‘Marah’ in the Hebrew language means ‘ bitter ’. Then they arrived at Marah. But they could not drink the water there because it was too bitter. That is why they called that place ‘Marah’. 15: ‘Marah’ in the Hebrew language means ‘ bitter ’. Then they arrived at Marah. But they could not drink the water there because it was too bitter. That is why they called that place ‘Marah’.
korean_text: 마라에 이르렀더니 그 곳 물이 써서 마시지 못하겠으므로 그 이름을 마라라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: But they could not drink the water there
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 그곳의 물을 마실 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: That is why they called that place 'Marah'
